meanings.definition: The sloping side of a hill.
meanings.sent1: The cows grazed peacefully on the hillslopes.
meanings.sent2: The children rolled down the hillslopes joyfully.
meanings.sent3: The hillslopes seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as gentle as the hillslopes at sunset.
meanings.sent5: The hillslopes were covered in a blanket of green, like a soft pillow.

meanings.definition: To move or slope down a hillside.
meanings.sent1: The river hillslopes gently towards the valley.
meanings.sent2: We hillsloped down the mountain, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent3: The cat hillsloped down the stairs, pretending to be a mountain climber.
meanings.sent4: Time hillsloped forward, carrying us along its path.
meanings.sent5: The ball hillsloped down the hill, picking up speed as it went.
